subtitles.login: Enter your credentials to sync progress across devices.
subtitles.register: We’ll use this info to personalize your dashboard.

DashboardLayout.dailyMetricsSubtitle: Track today's savings rate and stay in compounding rhythm.
DashboardLayout.dashboardSubtitle: Every log brings you closer to freedom—aim for a 50% savings rate today.

DashboardPage.pleaseLogin: Please log in to view progress

progressSection.title: FIRE progress
progressSection.subtitle: Marching toward ¥5M in financial freedom assets

allocation.title: Asset allocation
allocation.subtitle: Multi-account, multi-currency
allocation.description: Banking, brokerage, funds, digital assets, even mortgage positions can be tracked here with API sync or manual updates.

nextStep.label: Next Step
nextStep.title: Update December income and ETF DCA plan
nextStep.description: Spending is on budget this month. Keep savings above 50% and deploy new funds into the diversified portfolio.

progress.title: Track your FIRE plan
progress.desc: This card shows your current assets versus target. Add a plan to compute the target and progress.

planButton.title: Create your first plan
planButton.desc: Click here to set withdrawal rate, annual expense, and target. We’ll then show progress on the left.

AuthLoginPage.heading: Welcome back—keep advancing your freedom rate.
AuthLoginPage.description: Log in to update assets, record cash flow, review retirement simulations, and monitor live metrics. Everything is encrypted and visible only to you.
AuthLoginPage.formSubtitle: Enter your email and password. More login methods are coming soon.

AuthRegisterPage.heading: Create your account and own your FIRE playbook.
AuthRegisterPage.description: Build a private dashboard for assets, cash flow, FIRE simulations, and automation. Your data stays encrypted on servers in your region.
AuthRegisterPage.formSubtitle: We’ll tailor the dashboard to your profile once you sign up.
